data.message:
I would love to attned on the Saturday the 9th of December and take my partner with me.  We are in a long distance relationship and it can be hard to see each other and this would be amazing quality time with eachother. Also he suffers from fgfs a rare kidney faliure and is going through a chemo treatment at this current time so it would be lovely for him to have a break from all of the stress for the night. 

#CapitalJBB #CapitalFM #Cocacola #Holidaysarecoming
